name: Possible hints for a word

testSteps.description: 1: Possible hints for a word ({Word=APPLE, Hint Type=Starts with letter, Hint Text=The word starts with the letter A})

children.description: When the player requests a hint
Then the proposed hints should include "The word starts with the letter A"

testSteps.description: 2: Possible hints for a word ({Word=CREEK, Hint Type=Ends with letter, Hint Text=The word ends with the letter K})

children.description: When the player requests a hint
Then the proposed hints should include "The word ends with the letter K"

testSteps.description: 3: Possible hints for a word ({Word=GROWL, Hint Type=Single vowel, Hint Text=The word contains 1 vowel})

children.description: When the player requests a hint
Then the proposed hints should include "The word contains 1 vowel"

testSteps.description: 4: Possible hints for a word ({Word=APPLE, Hint Type=Multiple vowels, Hint Text=The word contains 2 vowels})

children.description: When the player requests a hint
Then the proposed hints should include "The word contains 2 vowels"

testSteps.description: 5: Possible hints for a word ({Word=CRYPT, Hint Type=No vowels, Hint Text=The word contains no vowels})

children.description: When the player requests a hint
Then the proposed hints should include "The word contains no vowels"

userStory.narrative:
As a Wordle player
  I want to be able to receive hints when I'm stuck
  So that I can keep the game progressing and learn new words

title: Possible hints for a word

rule.name: Hints should be proposed based on the structure and content of the word

values: The word starts with the letter A
The word ends with the letter K

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given the target word is "<Word>"
When the player requests a hint
Then the proposed hints should include "<Hint Text>"

scenarioOutline:
